name: Mara Provincial Park
review: Great park for beginner camping. Have medium size picnic areas. Some spots can be muddy. Good showers and washroom.

name: Mara Provincial Park
review: Found this spot after doing a google search knowing I would be in the Orillia area. It‚Äôs a great spot if you are just looking for a nice quiet beach, some hiking trails or a campground.  There is ample parking. The beach itself is large ...

name: Mara Provincial Park
review: I stayed at Mara Provincial Park last weekend. We were at a campsite near the end of the park that does a loop. We had 2 secluded campsites for 8 people. Park Wardens were friendly. The beach is huge and busy during the weekends. Would recommend  10/10.

name: Mara Provincial Park
review: Had a fantastic day at the beach. Loved everything about it. The temp was like 30¬∞ but didn't even feel it because of the trees n shade around.

name: Mara Provincial Park
review: Small park with approximately 100 sites. Our site wasn't very private but during the week it wasn't too busy. Beautiful beach within walking distance.

name: Mara Provincial Park
review: Loved it. But I wish they had a sign on how much entrance cost.like q small sign maybe put the cost up front it was 14 dollars and to pay in cash after a certain time for a day pass. But otherwise well worth the price for sure loved it hope they maintain it this way..

name: Mara Provincial Park
review: Very nice por children's can play it's clean.

name: Mara Provincial Park
review: Cute park, sites aren't very private

name: Mara Provincial Park
review: Wonderful little gem of a park!  We used it as an introduction to camping spot for our young kids since it wasn't that far from home.  If things went south quick it wouldn't be much to pack and go home.  Arrived in a downpour, but that ...

name: Mara Provincial Park
review: Had a great time! Was a very quiet park! Wpuld recommend it and would go back again.

name: Mara Provincial Park
review: I frequently visit Mara to camp during the summer and I love it! The park is fairly small which I enjoy as there is not much noise. The beach is very big as well. There is also a considerable amount of mosquito so don‚Äôt forget bug spray!

name: Mara Provincial Park
review: This is by far the best beach we have been to just outside the GTA. There is lots of space on the beach to set up your beach tents, mats etc, there's a grassy lawn with picnic tables, a small playground area with some slides and fun ...

name: Mara Provincial Park
review: It is a really nice park and the beach with lots of trees and a lot of space for kids to play sometimes in summer hot months they have a ban on open fires so if you are planning to have a charcoal BBQ make sure you call ahead and ask them if the ban is in effect you can still use your propane BBQ but not the charcoal one.

name: Mara Provincial Park
review: Very nice, small clean provincial park less then 2 hours drive from 401/400. Good for family and friends get together for picnics

name: Mara Provincial Park
review: Great beach! Tons of space. You can do anything from volleyball to throwing a football to swimming. If you hop by Orillia, this is the beach you must visit.

name: Mara Provincial Park
review: Super nice beach. Small but clean and very few people especially on a weekday.

name: Mara Provincial Park
review: There are two areas here: Beach and the other one is a Camping grounds. I went to the Beach area. Plenty of room, lots of sea shells, weeds and rocks. It hurts going in or going out to the water.The washrooms are nasty, not regularly being check and clean.The garbage/recycle bins are regularly check and emptied.

name: Mara Provincial Park
review: The park is well maintained and the washrooms are super clean. Super friendly staff...

name: Mara Provincial Park
review: Beach is awesome, shallow water, but no changing room, you will only get toilets and you have to use to do everything

name: Mara Provincial Park
review: Very Quiet and Peaceful .Enjoyed the hiking trail around the park.

name: Mara Provincial Park
review: A wonderful place to spend time with your family during the summer days.

name: Mara Provincial Park
review: I was skeptical about going to this beach but I'm glad I did. The beach is beautiful and the water is very clean. I read reviews saying you can't barbecue there but this is false. You can most definitely bbq as long as its a propane bbq. ...

name: Mara Provincial Park
review: Nice park, the water is clear, beach is clean. Please as the sign clearly states no dogs in the water, respect that.

name: Mara Provincial Park
review:
Too crowded  on weekends!!!!

This beach is a heaven on weekdays with not too many people around, however it's way too crowded on weekends, which makes it one of the worst places.

name: Mara Provincial Park
review: Great..beautiful beach..the only negative is our electric site the breaker keep going off..#23

name: Mara Provincial Park
review: Nice clean and friendly beach very recommended for kids and families. Also you can camp there!

name: Mara Provincial Park
review: Loved it there the park was beautiful

name: Mara Provincial Park
review: Very nice beach little bit crowded but very nice

name: Mara Provincial Park
review: Beautiful beach and clear shallow water. Love it here!

name: Mara Provincial Park
review: Beautiful and clean park with a nice beach. Campgrounds and picnic areas available as well.

name: Mara Provincial Park
review: Nice shadow picnic area close to beach.

name: Mara Provincial Park
review: The best rangers of any provincial park I've ever been to, work here.

name: Mara Provincial Park
review: Great Beach, close to Orillia and a nice homey feel to this campsite.

name: Mara Provincial Park
review: Decent beach. Water was great in th8s heat!

name: Mara Provincial Park

name: Mara Provincial Park
review: Beautiful park not to far from Toronto.  The privacy is great with the exception of the pull through section.  The park is not that large with a single comfort station that is in average condition.  The site we were on was huge with ...

name: Mara Provincial Park
review: The water is clean, clear and calm today

name: Mara Provincial Park
review: Love this place..shallow beach..clear water

name: Mara Provincial Park

name: Mara Provincial Park

name: Mara Provincial Park

name: Mara Provincial Park

name: Mara Provincial Park
review: Gorgeous park and amazing beach!

name: Mara Provincial Park

name: Mara Provincial Park
review: Super clean, lots of parking space and water is great. Little pebbles at the shore which make it hard to go in the water but once you go further in there is none.

name: Mara Provincial Park

name: Mara Provincial Park

name: Mara Provincial Park
review:
A small park for camping. 
Pros:
- Good beach of decent size.
- Big swimming area on the beach.
- No fear of Bears.
- Modern and clean Washrooms.

 Cons:
- Lots of mosquitos, 24 hours a day.  Don't  forget to bring mosquito repellent ...

name: Mara Provincial Park
review: Good place to be with the family!

name: Mara Provincial Park
review: Cleanest beach iv seen!!!

name: Mara Provincial Park
review: Good beach

name: Mara Provincial Park
review: Beautiful park. Sites are decent size and distance apart. Staff very friendly. Clean from litter. Quiet. Good escape for the weekend. Close to a timmies which is always appreciated. Outhouses could be cleaned more frequently though.

name: Mara Provincial Park
review: A lovely big beach and woodland picnic area

name: Mara Provincial Park
review: Nice park with pleasant staff and an excellent beach but thats about it, the bathrooms are cleaned but only the floor , sinks and toilets not the walls of the stalls or the bathroom itself.

name: Mara Provincial Park
review: Not a long beach but a big beach...nice water for kids..good facilities!

name: Mara Provincial Park
review: Lovely place to go with family for picnic. Clean washrooms. Friendly staff

name: Mara Provincial Park
review: It was good camping trip, the park not that big but the customer service was good, they kept the washrooms and showers clean most of the time, we had camp site with power , these sites were on higher ground so they dried faster in the Rian, the sites without power were flooded and muddy for days after rain.

name: Mara Provincial Park
review:

review: Great spot to catch the tailend of summer.

name: Mara Provincial Park
review: We canoed from Narrows Canoe & Kayak Co to Mara beach located in this park. The beach is nice, clean crystal clear water, fairly warm water temperature on a late summer day, very shallow - about waist level 100m into the lake.

name: Mara Provincial Park
review: Great for having a good time with family and friends. Lots of nice people. And water is clean.

name: Mara Provincial Park
review: Good camping on Lake Simcoe. Great views. Icefishing off shore. Good canoe and watersports

name: Mara Provincial Park
review: This place is fantastic and so close to the city

name: Mara Provincial Park
review: Hands down the best beach on Lake Simcoe! Have been coming here on the boat since I was a kid to swim. The bottom is very sandy so you do not have to wear water shoes!

name: Mara Provincial Park
review: Great park, amazing beach with soft sand and nice campgrounds. Lake water is clean and beach is shallow for the most part, great for kids
